alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:21PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Poinsett, northwestern Crittenden and eastern Cross Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 621 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Marked Tree, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Earle, Harrisburg, Parkin, Tyronza, Smithdale, Three Forks, Payneway, Birdeye, Booker, Tulot, Weona Junction, Weona, Hatchie Coon, Stewart, Dub, Colton, Twist, McDonald and Cloar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
